channel.title: Direct Export to Audius (Potential Idea)
channel.description: Audius is starting to become more popular with Auxy users (that I’ve seen in the past few weeks). It’s just an idea, but it would be cool that we can directly load our projects to Audius as well; the same way (or similar) to how we upload to SoundCloud via Auxy.

item.title: Direct Export to Audius (Potential Idea)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Soundcloud has extensive API’s for what it does, I’m not sure if Audius does. It’s early days for them still so I would guess not

Read full topic

item.title: Direct Export to Audius (Potential Idea)
item.dc:creator: Peregrihn
item.description:
Considering the reason Auxy got that feature was that lenberg was a former sc employee, idk if they’ll be able to secure (or even be interested in) partnership with Audius

Read full topic
